layout.singingstanza: God has a dream, this is what He's want -- ing. God has a dream, and we are part of it. God has a dream... that we may be one with Him. God has a dream... real -- ized in you and me! God, you and me... a dwell -- ing place to be. God in man, and man in God: one en -- ti -- ty. Now, it's my dream... my vi -- sion and life to be! God has a dream... real -- ised in you and me!

lyrics.stanza: God has a dream, this is what He's wanting. God has a dream, and we are part of it. God has a dream...that we may be one with Him. God has a dream...realized in you and me! God, you and me...a dwelling place to be. God in man, and man in God: one entity. Now, it's my dream...my vision and life to be! God has a dream...realised in you and me!
